title: Former FTX CEO Bankman-Fried considered $5B offer to prevent Donald Trump presidential run
description:
Former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried (SBF) considered paying Donald Trump $5 billion to dissuade him from running for president, according to Michael Lewis, an author writing a book on the disgraced founder. “There was a number that was kicking around. And the number that was kicking around when I was talking to Sam about this […]

The post Former FTX CEO Bankman-Fried considered $5B offer to prevent Donald Trump presidential run appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Space and Time’s Verifiable Compute Layer Is Integrated into Core Chainlink Functions
description: Space and Time (SxT), the decentralized data warehouse pioneering new use cases for zk-proofs, has announced an integration with Chainlink. The zk-Verifier that SxT relies on for its Proof of SQL solution is now available within Chainlink nodes. As a result, dapps are able to access verifiable proofs for centralized or decentralized databases simply by connecting to Chainlink’s node network.

title: One of Ethereum’s Biggest Rivals Gearing Up To Outperform ETH, According to Former ARK Invest Crypto Analyst
description:
